net.hockeyapp.android.internal
Class CheckUpdateTask

java.lang.Object
  android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,org.json.JSONArray>
      net.hockeyapp.android.internal.CheckUpdateTask

public class CheckUpdateTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,org.json.JSONArray>

Description

Internal helper class. Checks if a new update is available by fetching version data from Hockeyapp.
